purpose: Curate and showcase a collection of resources related to LLM-powered agents, including research papers, repositories, and blogs
principle: Compiles and organizes community-contributed resources and information on large language model (LLM) applications and advancements
reusability: Open-source repository that can be forked and contributed to by the community
limitations: Primarily a static collection of links and resources without interactive features or dynamic content
name: awesome-llm-powered-agent
description: Awesome things about LLM-powered agents. Papers / Repos / Blogs / ...
highlight: Comprehensive and community-driven collection of resources on LLM-powered agents
